casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Darrick Jerome MYERS. No. 519P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. Linda Kimbell, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of September 2006 by Defendant for "Letter of Request to Review N.C. Court of Appeals Opinion":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of October 2006."
